title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate your growth: AWS Partner Programs for Software Partners (PEX103)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速您的增长：面向软件合作伙伴的 AWS 合作伙伴计划 (PEX103)
abstract: Discover how AWS Partner Programs empower software partners to build, market, sell, and grow. Explore tailored programs with compelling benefits at each partnership stage, from development to market expansion, including learning how AWS Marketplace listings connect you directly with AWS sales through the SaaS Co-Sell Benefit, expanding your customer reach and accelerating sales cycles. See how AWS Partners leverage these program like ISV Accelerate and AWS Marketplace & List Sell Program to drive business growth and customer success. Join us to unlock AWS's comprehensive support system designed specifically for ISVs, including go-to-marketing strategies, migration support and best practices through AWS ISV Workload Migration Program (WMP), and funding opportunities.
abstract_cn: 了解AWS合作伙伴计划如何赋能软件合作伙伴进行构建、营销、销售和增长。探索在合作伙伴关系的各个阶段（从开发到市场扩张）提供引人注目的权益的定制化计划，包括了解AWS Marketplace列表如何通过SaaS联合销售权益将您直接与AWS销售团队连接，扩大您的客户覆盖范围并加速销售周期。了解AWS合作伙伴如何利用ISV Accelerate和AWS Marketplace及List Sell计划等项目来推动业务增长和客户成功。加入我们，解锁AWS专为ISV设计的全面支持体系，包括市场推广策略、通过AWS ISV工作负载迁移计划(WMP)提供的迁移支持和最佳实践，以及资金机会。

presenter.name: Mathangi Ranganathan
presenter.title: Sr. Manager, ISV Workload Migration Program
